EmailTemplate.name: RO Note Exchange
EmailTemplate.subject: RO Note Exchange : {!Case.Subject}, {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.OwnerFullName},
{!Case.CaseNumber} has been created and assigned to your team. Please review the Note from the Aeroxchange R&O customer below. Please reply directly to this email to respond to the customer. Your response will be sent to Aeroxchange under the “Notes” tab for the customer to view.
Name : <Enter Name here> ServiceOrderNumber : <Enter Service Order Number#> SupplierCageCode : <Enter SupplierCageCode #> Customer Code : <Enter Customer Code #> Purchase Order : <Enter Reference Identifier> Customer Remarks : <Enter Remarks >
Thanks, <Enter Name here>
